mapper.insert: insert into account (username, password, u_type) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD5(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{uType,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update account set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_type = #{uType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REMOVED = #{removed,jdbcType=CHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, u_type, REMOVED, create_time, update_time from account where REMOVED = '0'
select id, username, password, u_type, REMOVED, create_time, update_time from account where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REMOVED = '0'
